Introduction
This topic contains information on RO division responsibilities in the VA home loan program, including
Veterans Service Center (VSC) responsibility for home loan determinations
benefit eligibility support team (BEST) responsibility for home loan related determinations
disability rating activity site (DRAS) responsibility for home loan related determinations
pension management center (PMC) eligibility determinations for surviving spouses
development for certification purposes
when a rating decision is required
instructions for preparing the rating decision
making basic eligibility determinations
providing certification
, and
limit on the number of certifications that may be issued
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Home Loan Program
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A
